General.Name: Rajnandini Metal Limited
General.Description: Rajnandini Metal Limited engages in the trading of ferrous and non-ferrous metal scrap in India and internationally. It offers steel, iron, iron alloy, castings, various metals, various kind of chemicals, furnace oils, petroleum products, iron and steel, aluminum, tin, nickel, zinc led, copper, cooper continuous road, brass, silicon scrap, and their products. The company also manufactures and sells copper products comprising copper rods, annealed bare copper wires, fine copper wires, bunched copper wires, and submersible wires and cables. The company was incorporated in 2010 and is based in Rewari, India.
